title: Font used for the movie Paranormal Activity
content:
Hi,

Some guys at my company are doing an online campaign for the surprisingly popular movie Paranormal Activity. Does anyone know what font is being using for the title? Make sure to have a good look at the 't'.

Something quite similar will be fine too.

You can se more here: [http://www.paranormalactivity-movie.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415120755/http:/www.paranormalactivity-movie.com/ "http://www.paranormalactivity-movie.com/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415120755im_/http:/typophile.com/files/paranormal_font_3965.jpg)

Thanks in advance.
author: peter_monrad

comments.content: That's a very good suggestion, but I think it will take some work to make it look alike. The font in the title seems lower and more square, and it looks a bit like the angle in the 'T' is more rounded in the bottom, than in Kautika? But that could be the Photoshopping, I guess.

Maybe they used small caps as a starting point.  
That said, more than "lower", it seems horizontally stretched to me.
